page.title: fragments per kilobase of transcript per million fragments mapped

revision.text: expected fragments per kilobase of transcript per million fragments mapped is a metric used to report transcript expression event as generated by RNA-Seq using paired-end library. The calculated value results from 2 types of normalization, one to take into account the difference in reads counts associated with transcript length (at equal abundance, longer transcripts will have more reads than shorter transcripts) , (hence the 'per kilobase of transcript') and the other one to take into account different sequencing depth during distinct sequencing runs (hence the 'per millions mapped fragment'. The metric is specifically produced by cufflink software. Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra FPKM
